mapper.select: select store_no as storeNo, member_id as memberId, store_title as storeTitle, store_category as storeCategory, store_content as storeContent, store_product as storeProduct, store_productcontent as storeProductcontent, store_price as storePrice, store_count as storeCount, store_delivery as storeDelivery, store_return as storeReturn, store_change as storeChange, store_reportcount as storeReportcount, store_warning as storeWarning, store_img1 as storeImg1, store_img2 as storeImg2, store_img3 as storeImg3, store_img4 as storeImg4, store_img5 as storeImg5 from store_tmp
mapper.insert:
insert into store_tmp values (st_seq.nextval,#{memberId},null,#{stCategory},null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null)
select max(st_no) from store_tmp
mapper.select: select st_no as stNo, member_id as memberId, st_title as stTitle, st_category as stCategory, st_content as stContent, st_product as stProduct, st_productcontent as stProductcontent, st_price as stPrice, st_count as stCount, st_delivery as stDelivery, st_return as stReturn, st_change as stChange, st_img1 as stImg1, st_img2 as stImg2, st_img3 as stImg3, st_img4 as stImg4, st_img5 as stImg5 from store_tmp where st_no = #{stNo}
